title: protocol - Glossary | CSRC
author: CSRC Content Editor
cleaned_text: This is a potential security issue, you are being redirected to [https://csrc.nist.gov](https://csrc.nist.gov). A set of rules (i.e., formats and procedures) to implement and control some type of association (e.g., communication) between systems. Sources: [CNSSI Protocol [NISTIR 8183A Vol. 3](https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.IR.8183A-3) under Protocol A set of rules used by two or more communicating entities that describe the message order and data structures for information exchanged between the entities. Sources: [NIST SP 800-175B Rev. 1](https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.SP.800-175Br1) under Protocol [NIST SP 800-56B Rev. 2](https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.SP.800-56Br2) under Protocol A set of rules (i.e., formats and procedures) for communications that computers use when sending signals between themselves. Sources: [NISTIR 7316](https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.IR.7316) under Protocol
